string.text: PDA Rat
Unknown
A PDA sealed tight. Contains secrets of the bandit group under the leadership of boss Borov.
According to Frol, there was supposed to be a weapons cache somewhere around here... Probably been cleaned out ages ago.
Bootleg vodka
There was one dealer in the Zone, tried selling cheap vodka. The dealer's now on the other side cursing his greed.
Radioactive bread
Was normal bread once... Now it's radioactive... If you're sick of living, you can eat it.
Hunters' stash
Hey there, bro... Gonna shoot the breeze?
And no coughin' to you too... What we chattin' 'bout?
Just this and that... sit a bit, crack open a bottle...
Well, pour it out...
Beat it, I don't drink with just anyone...
Then get lost!
Let's take a swig...
Motherf... We're out of the nectar...
Ohhh... That hit the spot... Could use a sniff of bacon...
Listen, pal... Heard any-y-thing interesting?
Just for you, bro... Found a PDA on a corpse recently, had info about a stash... Too lazy to trek there myself, but since you're a solid mate, you can 'ave it.
You're something... dude, what's there to be interestin' here, this ain't Rio-de-Zhytomyr... Boring as hell!
If I got nothing better to do, I'll swing by, take a looksie...
Alright, if you got sumthin' - give me a shout...
How's life, pal?... Let's hang out?
No problem, fo' sho... Get your ass over here...
Fo' real, could use some grub...
Let's pour it out, and we'll find some grub, don't worry...
Beat it, I don't drink with just anyone...
Then get lost!
Let's do it then, for the boys...
Nah, man, if I had any...
For the boys, fo' real...
Man, whistle sumthin' interesting... Eh?

Interesting? Heard some chatter at a gatherin', seems like there's a stash that ain't been touched... I ain't draggin' my ass that far, got enough suckers here to work with, if it ain't too much trouble, write down the tip...
Catch a bird, it'll whistle for ya...
Nah, too much trouble for me too, if I pass by - won't even bend down...
Chill out, twerp...
Greetings to the bosses! What y'all chattin' about?
Greetings, greetings. Sucker. Even though Borov ordered us not to touch you, don't push it...
Boring without vodka... And in prison right now it's dinner time, they're givin' pasta!
Don't croak, better pour some for the brothers...
Beat it, I don't drink with just anyone...
Then get lost!
Alright, brothers. So it don't go sideways!
Right, gonna chat with Borov and then pour.
Mmmm, respect! Should've started with this...
What's new to hear? Heard any-y-thing interesting?

What's new... Yesterday we took three Duty boys with the guys, they just sit on their posts like pretzels, and then right away: "guys, don't do it"... "can show ya loot"... What loot, they think they can mess with our heads and slip away quiet-like, then come back with the whole gang... Heh... And he's like: "there's a stash real close", what a moron, eh? Ah, screw it all... That stash of his... Now... Oh! There it is!.. Check it out...
What's new? What's new here, it's all the same old thing!
Ha, half a day's trek there, they were definitely messin' with our heads...
Later, when you got a half-liter, drop by...
Well! Look who I see! How many years, how many winters!
Beat it, can't you see I'm tired after yesterday...
Well come on, let's fix our health...
Yesterday we drank everything, totally broke...
Beat it, I don't drink with just anyone...
Then get lost!
Always keep a little medicine for health... Let's go!
Oops! And I'm empty today...
Ohhh... Benefactor...
What they sayin' at your place? Any more loot spots?

You bet! Don't make too much noise, I saw how Borov's lackeys were hidin' loot here... Won't take it myself, 'cause it's strict with us, might wake up with a shiv in your liver, but you came - you left, nobody'll notice. And when you're passin' by, drop in, we'll think of a couple more deals... Deal?
All the loot spots Borov took for himself, we get the crumbs...
Deal!
Alright, I'm outta here, bye...
Hey there, little brother... How's it going?
Nothing special, seems like... You want something or just passing by?
Just like that... it's quiet here, figured I'd sit a bit, fix our health...
Health is good, pour some, I guess...
My health is fine, not drinking today...
Well, suit yourself.
Well, let's have a little bit...
Could use someone pouring for me...
Strong... Son of a bitch... Could use a sniff of bacon...
Yeah... That hit the sp-o-ot... Probably don't know anything interesting?

Recently pulled a stalker out of an anomaly with Wolf, or rather what was left of him... Yeah... He had a note with coordinates. Said there's hidden loot there... But Wolf said not to go there. Here are the coordinates: write them down, if it's worth it, tell me later... Deal?
Nah, I'm new here, haven't gone deep yet... Come back in a week, maybe I'll learn something...
Deal... I'll take a look...
Alright, we'll talk more when there's time...
Hey there, how's stalker life?
Hey there to you too, Marked One... So-so... Taking it slow...
Maybe five drops each on the chest? To fix our health...
Wouldn't hurt! Treat me, since you're so kind...
My health is fine, not drinking today...
Well, suit yourself.
Well, let's have a hundred fifty for courage...
Just a sec, gotta run to Sidorovich real quick...
Cough cough, damn... What'd they make this from, a stool? Almost came back up...
Anything can happen here... Tell me something...

Recently a couple stalkers came to Sidorovich... I was sleeping in Sidorovich's anteroom. Well, not really sleeping, more like half-watching... They wanted to trade some gear from him, on credit, so to speak... They said there's a rich stash with loot, even described the place... But Sidorovich didn't give them anything - what a cheapskate, eh? Thought about going myself, but can't work up the nerve. Here's the place, see? If there's anything good, you won't forget about me?
What's to tell... It's the Zone, it is what it is, wish I could get out of here...
If there's anything worthwhile, I won't forget...
We'll get out, someday...
Why are you so gloomy?... Maybe you need help?
What's there to be cheerful about? So depressing, could hang myself...
Well, let's have some, not for drunkenness sake, but for mood...
Ah, let's do it! Maybe it'll help...
My mood is fine, not drinking today...
Well, suit yourself.
So... Hold steady... For HOPE!
Damn! I remember for sure: had a bottle! And it's GONE!
For her, dear one... Thanks, good men still exist...
They say you can find loot nearby, haven't heard?
Yeah, they say there's a stash with loot, and not that far from here... But whoever went to check, nobody came back. Let me show you on the map: right here...
Nah, haven't heard... I don't really listen to chatterboxes...
Won't go specially, but if I'm nearby, I'll take a look...
That's right, less you know - better you sleep...
Hey there, guy... Maybe we'll have a drink?
Hey there... What's the talk about...
Let's sit, wag our tongues over some good snacks...
Snacks are on me, come on pour it, what are you waiting for?
No time for me to wag tongues, gotta move soon...
Well, suit yourself.
There she is, dear one, clear as a tear!
Got snacks... But her, dear one, no...
Phew, good stuff! Went right through to my ass... Good!
I understand... what's the word in the Zone?

Day before yesterday cracked open a couple bottles with the soldiers... Had a sit... They run here from Agroprom pretty often, Sidorovich supplies them with vodka. So they told me they caught a zombified stalker, well, you understand, he mumbles and grabs for his gun. The commander ordered to take him alive, send him to the eggheads on the mainland - for experiments, yeah... I think better would've been a bullet to the temple right away... Yeah, what was I talking about?.. Ah, well, this zombie had a drawing right on his hand, like a tattoo, but not a real one, more like someone carved it with a knife... Like a map. Their commander checked it against the landmarks - and it looks like there's a stash with loot not far from here. About right here...
Lot of things to hear, about anomalies, about monsters, can't tell everything at once, come back again, we'll talk...
Yeah, better right away... without suffering...
I'll come back, we'll talk...
Hey there, brother... How are things with you guys?
Mutants sometimes attack... But otherwise seems everything's normal...
Let's drink to getting acquainted?.. Or command won't allow it?
What command... Our sergeant is an old serviceman, understands that in the Zone you can't do without this. So don't worry - pour it.
It's not about command, just not in the mood...
Well, suit yourself.
Well! For good people!..
Would pour some, but had to spend the last half-liter on health...
For us, that is! Have a snack, here's some sausage...
Thanks... What's the word here? Maybe some news?

No special news. But heard about Max Luber? Bandits from Dark Valley caught him with his buddy... Bullet - Luber's friend - went after their trail... And before that he said that Max's buddy managed to drop a map marking a place with hidden loot... Here! Bullet asked someone to go there, but Prapor didn't allow it, said there's already too few fighters left at the post. Anyway, here's this place, take it so the bandits don't get it.
Don't think I heard anything special, just small stuff...
Alright, I'll take it...
Well, see ya later, we'll meet again...
Greetings, serviceman!
Same to you... Where'd you come from?
Just wandering the Zone slowly... How about a hundred grams?
What kind of question is that! Two hundred grams never hurt anyone...
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Take two fifty and no snacks...
Gonna dump these artifacts on Barkeep and come back...
Ha, went down smooth... Why chase such nectar with food...
That's for sure, just wasting good stuff... Tell me something...

Few days ago Bes was visiting here, good man, even though he's a loner... No offense, right? We helped him out a bit with ammo, talked about this and that... He didn't have anything valuable, so he told us about a stash he found. No loot there though, but judging by the signs, someone often hides stuff there. If you're interested, scout it out, see whose it is...
What's to tell... It's the Zone, it is what it is, if it wasn't for us, the infection would've spread all over the world long ago...
I'll try to scout it out...
Well, bye then, savior of the world...
Hey there, man, your face looks familiar, haven't we met before?
Who knows, I only remember those I'm friends with...
Well, come on, not for cursed drunkenness, but for friendship...
Well now, seems like I remember... Come on, pour it!
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
So... Hold steady... For Friendship!
Damn! I remember for sure - had a bottle! And it's GONE!
For reliable friends! With whom you won't perish even in the Zone!
They say you can find loot nearby, haven't heard?

Haven't told anyone, but I'll tell you as a friend. There's a tip about one stash... Found out about it by accident. Maybe there's nothing there, maybe there's a shitload of loot. If you're a real friend, you'll share, I think?
Nah, haven't heard... Gathered everything that was nearby, and what's further out, only Strelok knows...
No question! For a friend nothing's too much...
Strelok? Well, well... I have a question or two for him...
Hey there, let's talk, you don't mind?
Have a seat... What's the talk about...
Maybe five drops each for lubrication?
Snacks are on me, come on, pour it, what are you waiting for?
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Hold the glasses steady, or I won't see the edges...
Got snacks... But her, dear one, no...
It burns... Ooh! Lubricated like oil...
Isn't it depressing sitting here all day?

Nah, what's to be depressed about? Barkeep delivers snacks, supposedly pays for protection... Loners pass by often, share the latest info... Plus there's stuff to shoot at. \nFunny story: bandits been getting cocky lately, setting up ambushes... So there's one lying there, pretending to be a wounded stalker, sending SOS on all frequencies. And a pair of burers ran into him... As soon as this "wounded" guy heard their screams, he grabbed his legs and bolted, not looking where he was going. Flew right into our camp and headfirst into the awning support - crash! Noise, crackling, stench - this lover of easy loot shit himself to the ears... Then he was shaking and promising to make everyone rich, said he hid loot and marked it on the map... What a fool, really... None of us gonna risk our asses for some loot. We're a barrier! Protecting the world from evil. If you're interested, here's his mark...
Depressing, of course, but at least you feel useful - protecting the World from evil!
Yeah, he was funny... I'll check it out if I get a chance, though I think it's bullshit...
Well then, won't distract the hero...
Hey there, little brother... How's life?
Bandits are driving me crazy! Don't have enough nerves! They keep coming and coming!
Blow off some steam... Let's relax a little...
I'm not boiling over, just haven't had a normal drink in a while... Pour it, since you offered...
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Let's drink to tomorrow, so we can see it!
I'm empty right now, gonna get some loot and buy from the dealers...
Come on! To dying of old age!
There... That helped a bit... What are they saying?

Everyone tries to keep their thoughts to themselves. It's the Zone, brother... But I heard that a couple guys, running from the military, dropped their loot... Was gonna take it myself, but don't think I'll make it there... So if you want, help yourself, otherwise it'll be lost completely - those guys got killed by bandits in another raid the other day. Shame, they were good stalkers, solid buddies...
Everyone tries to keep their thoughts to themselves. It's the Zone, brother... Even friends try not to plan for tomorrow... So they don't jinx it...
Yeah... A lot of good people are gone...
That's for sure! Alright, friend, see you tomorrow...
What was all that shooting about?
We shoot to scare enemies and ourselves...
Let's have two fifty for courage?
Pour it out!
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Take two fifty! So we're not the worst off!
Wait a bit, I'll check what's going on here...
Phew! What nasty stuff, but it's strong...
Heh, what did you want, lemonade? What interesting news have you heard?

Bes and his guys killed a ten marauders near the swamp, I went there later... The corpses, of course, were thoroughly torn apart by beasts, quite a sight... I see something glinting in this mess, pulled out a small bottle with a stick, tiny one, souvenir-sized, about fifty grams. Yeah... Seems this bastard swallowed it when things got hot. In this bottle was a piece of paper, with a map and a mark about hidden loot. Here's this map, try to get there, I couldn't...
Yeah, everything's as usual, one died in an anomaly, another got shot, and the third just vanished without a trace... Those are our "interesting" news...
If I can get there, half is yours...
Alright, don't get depressed... See you around.
Hey there, mind exchanging a few words?
What's there to chat about? If it was business...
Maybe we'll toast to getting acquainted? Why not?
Got nothing to toast with... If you got some, bring it out, don't just talk...
Don't want to right now. Not feeling it...
Well, suit yourself.
Got it, got it! Let's drink to kindred souls!
Sorry, friend, I'm out too...
You talk too much... drinking, like living, should be done quietly...
A philosopher appeared! Well, enlighten me, how should one live...

Everyone lives their own way, and you can't learn someone else's life... There was Lucky Lyovka, heard of him probably? Always bragged about how lucky he was, how women loved him, how all monsters avoided him... Didn't live day by day, always hiding loot, setting up stashes. Couldn't drink with him, couldn't have fun normally, saved artifacts, didn't sell to local dealers, thought he'd dump everything on the mainland and live like cheese in butter... And where is he now? Not even a strand of hair left, completely dissolved in "Fruit Punch". And now other lucky ones are looking for his stashes... But I think there'll be no happiness from that loot, and it's not needed by those who, like me, live only for one day...
Why should I enlighten you... If you have a life path, then you'll walk it, and if not - then you won't get one anyway...
Maybe you're right, but I think: you need to care about tomorrow...
Fate, then... And I believe in humans...
How's it going, friend?
Slowly, a bit depressing, honestly...
Let's have some for mood? Just a little bit?
You bring the bottle, I'll bring everything else...
Nah, get lost...
Well, suit yourself.
Agreed! Give me the glasses...
Got everything else, no bottle though...
Good stuff, damn! Burned right through my guts!
Tell me something more interesting...

More interesting? Hmm... What should I make up... Ah! Alright, I'll tell it like it is... You know Yurik? Just a kid, tried to go after loot alongside experienced stalkers. His head's really weak for drinking, steps on a cork and carries on like a bucket... Yesterday he sat here with us, his tongue went like a broom... Got carried away, like he'd wipe everyone's nose, because he knows where loot is hidden. We made fun of him, so he started getting cocky - showing everyone his PDA with a mark on the stash location. Nobody believed him, of course, where would a snot-nose from Cordon get such info... Like there's some loot here... Would you have believed him?
My tongue's getting tangled, I'll tell you something tomorrow...
No, wouldn't have believed... Yurik's quite the bullshitter...
Till tomorrow then, friend...
Hey there, how are things with you guys?
It's fun here, you want - go to Bar, you want - chat with the Duty guys or make bets at the arena. Lots of rumors going around - Bar's almost in the center of the Zone...
Maybe we'll have a shot glass each? To getting acquainted...
Not bad either... Come on pour it, I'll take you to the arena after, tickle our nerves...
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Come on, for spirit!
I'll run to "100 Roentgen" for a bottle and back... Wait!
Well come on...
What rumors are going around, what interesting stuff are they saying?

Lots of things... Seems there's a teleporter straight to the Monolith, though they name no less than a ten different places. A new breed of monsters appeared - they fight with electricity, total chaos... Duty keeps fighting with the Freedomers over the Zone, always hearing: either these guys killed those, or those killed these, but what's to divide? There's enough Zone for everyone... Recently caught a Freedomer and led him to their basement for re-education, psychiatrists too... So that Freedomer threw something into the bushes, I went later, found his PDA, and it had stash coordinates. Here. Let's look together, what's there? It should be around here somewhere...
Come by the Bar in the evening, our guys will gather, we'll chat... You can hear lots of useful stuff, just don't forget to bring drinks...
Too far, I'm going in the other direction for now...
Alright, I'll come...
Hey there, old man. How's life?
Hitting like a wrench... In the head... what do you need?
Why are you so angry! Let's have some for mood?
Had enough of everything! Roll it out...
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Alright! Spit on everything... Let's go!
I'd rather get lost...
Well come on... At least they haven't forgotten how to make vodka yet...
Yeah, pure as a komsomol's tear... What's bugging you?

Just bastards all around... You do good for people, and they smear you with shit. I found one stash, thought to get there with one bastard together, so there'd be someone to cover my back. So this infection slipped away quietly, even managed to gut my backpack... Ugh... People... Bastards! Maybe you can beat him there? Here's this stash...
Enough freaks starting with M, can't trust anyone... Always trying to pull some dirty trick...
I'll try, if I can. I'll try to restore your faith in people.
You're angry, I'm getting away from you...
Hey there, brother, haven't we met before?
Yeah, your face was flashing around, seems like, what's your name?
Call me Marked One, everyone calls me that...
Alright, Marked One, so Marked One, well let's drink to getting acquainted? Got some with you?
Well alright, Marked One. Would've had some for getting acquainted, but not feeling it right now...
Well, suit yourself.
You bet! Here! Strong as a monk's mother...
No, don't have any... Had to give away all my supply for ammo...
Ha! True! Strong! Well then, brother Marked One, now there's two more good people in the Zone...
They say you can find loot nearby, haven't heard?

Well, since you're a good person, and good people should help each other, I'll tell you like a confession, Marked One... Zombies lately started wandering right here very often, and here's the puzzle - all approaches to the base are blocked by Duty guys, even a mouse couldn't get through, but these still appear. They mumble something, stretch their hands... Creepy! Yesterday night I was having a cultural rest - Barkeep the bastard won't pour on credit anymore, what a cheapskate, eh? So anyway, I dozed off, I feel a stench and heaviness pressed down, I open my eyes - there he is, the walking corpse. I was completely paralyzed, couldn't move hand or foot... Not from fear, of course, just from surprise... And the corpse says something nasally, listened closer, numbers it seems, again and again the same thing. I closed my eyes, opened them - nobody there... Only the stench remained. And the numbers kept ringing in my head, looked later - seems like coordinates. But far from here... That's the story, brother...
All the loot that was in easy places got cleaned out completely... Need to push toward the Zone center, they say it's a Klondike there...
Seems the vodka was bootleg, where'd you get it?
A Klondike, you say? Well, well...
Why so cheerless, friend?

Just thinking, need to get out of the Zone... Each day gets worse and worse. Monsters get more dangerous and angrier, weather's shit, anomalies you can't tell where, and worst of all - people are turning into beasts...
Alright, forget it! Let's better have a drink...
Well come on, got something?
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Wouldn't offer if I didn't have any...
Damn devil! There was another bottle! Someone stole it!
Eh-h-h, not Chardonnay, of course, but not bad either!
Why don't you go after loot?

It's a long story... You in a hurry? Seryoga Earless and I were friends, always went on deep raids together... Sometimes we'd get all the way to the "Brain Scorcher", saw those phantoms and more... \nPour a bit more... Yeah, Seryoga... His ear got shot off in Chechnya, that's where the nickname came from. How many times we covered each other's backs... On the last trip we ran into a pseudogiant, not particularly dangerous creature, if you don't rush at it like an idiot. But it happened that this beast slammed its paw on the ground, Seryoga got thrown, well, probably no more than half a meter, right into "Fruit Punch", with his whole body... Face, hands... everything. Meat flowed like jelly from his skull... And he was conscious... Pour some, my soul burns... I left him there. And left my soul there too. We had a stash, I won't take it, don't want to... If you find it, remember Seryoga...
I can't... The Zone broke me... Another day or two and I'll go try to get out...
I'll remember...
Right... Probably...
Hello, let's talk?
Hello, why not? You, I see, aren't one of those shitheads...
No, not one of them... Let's have a hundred grams each?
Well... Not bad... Pour it...
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Well, let's drink to getting acquainted...
Eh, ran out, dear one...
To getting acquainted... Phew, where'd you get this... Pure nastiness...
Yeah, not Smirnoff! What's the word in the Zone?

Well, heard something... Seems there are rich stashes, left by dead stalkers. There are secret clan stashes, but nobody said they found one. A PDA completely by chance came into my hands, marking a stash location, I can share with you... I probably won't make it there myself...
Come by the Bar in the evening, our guys will gather, we'll chat... You can hear lots of useful stuff, just don't forget to bring drinks...
Thanks, if I'm in those parts, I'll check...
Alright, I'll come...
Hey there, old man. How's life?
Hitting like a wrench... In the head... what do you need?
Why are you so angry! Let's have some for mood?
Had enough of everything! Roll it out...
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Alright! Spit on everything... Let's go!
I'd rather get lost...
Well come on... At least they haven't forgotten how to make vodka yet...
Yeah, pure as a komsomol's tear... What's bugging you?

Just bastards all around... You do good for people, and they smear you with shit. I found one stash, thought to get there with one bastard together, so there'd be someone to cover my back. So this infection slipped away quietly, even managed to gut my backpack... Ugh... People... Bastards! Maybe you can beat him there? Here's this stash...
Enough freaks starting with M, can't trust anyone... Always trying to pull some dirty trick...
I'll try, if I can, I'll try to restore your faith in people.
You're angry, I'm getting away from you...
Hey there, brother, haven't we met before?
Yeah, your face was flashing around, seems like, what's your name?
Call me Marked One, everyone calls me that...
Alright, Marked One so Marked One, well, let's drink to getting acquainted? Got some with you?
Well alright, Marked One. Would've had some for getting acquainted, but not feeling it right now...
Well, suit yourself.
You bet! Here! Strong as a monk's mother...
No, don't have any... Had to give away all my supply for ammo...
Ha! True! Strong! Well then, brother Marked One, now there's two more good people in the Zone...
They say you can find loot nearby, haven't heard?

Recently I wandered to Yantar, to see what the eggheads dug in there... Didn't go far, brain's not government-issued... Saw those poor souls there - zombified stalkers. They shoot like Voroshilov marksmen though! How do they manage? Brain doesn't work, does it? No? One of them was dying, I tried to search him - so, dear mother! Some nastiness sprayed out of him, almost kicked the bucket, got poisoned... Anyway, he had a map with a stash mark... But I won't risk going there, but I can share with you.
All the loot that was in easy places got cleaned out completely... Need to push toward the Zone center, they say it's a Klondike there...
Alright, I'll risk it!..
A Klondike, you say? Well, well...
Why so cheerless, friend?

Just thinking, need to get out of the Zone... Each day gets worse and worse. Monsters get more dangerous and angrier, weather's shit, anomalies you can't tell where, and worst of all - people are turning into beasts...
Alright, forget it! Let's better have a drink...
Well come on, got something?
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Wouldn't offer if I didn't have any...
Damn devil! There was another bottle! Someone stole it!
Eh-h-h, not Chardonnay, of course, but not bad either!
Why don't you go after loot?

It's a long story... You in a hurry? Seryoga Earless and I were friends, always went on deep raids together... Sometimes we'd get all the way to the "Brain Scorcher", saw those phantoms and more... \nPour a bit more... Yeah, Seryoga... His ear got shot off in Chechnya, that's where the nickname came from. How many times we covered each other's backs... On the last trip we ran into a pseudogiant, not particularly dangerous creature, if you don't rush at it like an idiot. But it happened that this beast slammed its paw on the ground, Seryoga got thrown, well, probably no more than half a meter, right into "Fruit Punch", with his whole body... Face, hands... everything. Meat flowed like jelly from his skull... And he was conscious... Pour some, my soul burns... I left him there. And left my soul there too. We had a stash, I won't take it, don't want to... If you find it, remember Seryoga...
I can't... The Zone broke me... Another day or two and I'll go try to get out...
I'll remember...
Right... Probably...
Hey there, little brother? How's it going?
Couldn't be better... Recently they brought us such good stuff, was in another world for 3 days... Shame it ran out...
Well... Yeah... That's bad, of course. Maybe a shot glass each?
What kind of question is that?! Got some?
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Always got some for such occasions!
That's the thing, don't have any.
Eh, it fell through, didn't notice...

You heard, some stalker came to Bar the other day... They say he cleaned out some big shot mercenary's stash. He was happy, told everyone how he picked up this mercenary's PDA somewhere here, at the Warehouses... Next day he disappeared somewhere, and nobody's seen him since, seems the mercenaries got him... That's how it is.

Yeah, that's all bullshit... We scare those mercenaries like cockroaches. We organized a raid on Duty's base, it was a terrible war, but we couldn't break through - an emission hit, a powerful one... brains just boiled over, I hid behind a Duty corpse, spotted a PDA, so I grabbed it... Had to escape to Wild Territory... Holed up in some garage, waited out the emission... Returned to base, I investigated this PDA and saw a mark on the map right here, didn't have time to check, so here, take it...
Damn him. Shouldn't have shown off, might have lived longer. I'm getting sleepy... Come again! We'll chat about this and that...
Yeah, I'll check it out sometime, thanks. See you soon...
I'll come by, of course, no question.
Hey there, friend! How's life?
Kind of weird, nobody wants to join our ranks... Maybe you'll sign up with us? Life will be more peaceful...
Well, I'm just thinking about that... Maybe we'll skip a bottle for getting acquainted?
Eh, if only there were more generous people like you... I've got just the thing - half a kilo of sausage saved for such occasions. Bring out the elixir!
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
There, real Ukrainian... "Cossacks". Hold the shot glass!
I was ju-ust about to go to Screw, now, if he's got any left, I'll grab some...
Brrr... My liver won't be happy... That's an A+ for your personal file!
Well then, buddy? Hic... What's go-oing on with you guys generally?

Well, recently Lukash asked me to run to the Barrier... Said they had some trouble there... So I took these monkeys sitting by the fire, see? Well, and to the Barrier... And there - massive zombie attack! About 50 of them, probably... Only lost the sniper, though I thought we'd all die. Well, zombified ones are tough bastards, so like it or not, you gotta finish them off... I approach one, and he's mumbling some numbers, repeated them several times, so I "helped" the poor guy. When I returned, it dawned on me that these numbers are coordinates, but coordinates to what? Right here...
What can happen here? Recently they brought plan - awesome! If you want to get some, ask Bootlegger, he knows where to get it. Come again, we'll chat...
Yeah, these zombies constantly mumble something. Don't pay attention.
Well, see you! I gotta go.
Greetings, guys! Can I join you?
Hello there, Marked One! Come on, move over guys, make room for the VIP!
Thanks for the hospitality. Maybe a shot glass each?
Now that's what I understand! There's kebab cooking just for such occasions! So, where's "the stuff"?
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
"The stuff" is always with me! Here!
Where did I put it?.. Anyway, lost it somewhere. Now, I'll run to Bootlegger...
Brrr... Where'd you get this stuff? Tell me the spot - I'll always buy there!
Yeah... Don't say, the best I've ever drunk! I found it in a stash, not far from here...

Listen, maybe our Cook stashed it for a rainy day? Was drinking with him once, so he let slip that he unloads right there. He's our taster! Maybe you'll run there? There'll be a continuation of the banquet!
Shame, otherwise I'd buy it by the crate, excellent vodka! Well, if there's more - come by! I'm going to sleep.
Yeah... Cook's probably the Zone champion in liter-throwing... Well, see you...
Of course I'll come... well, good luck!
Hey there! Why are you moping? Why so upset?
Hey there, Marked One. What's not to mope about? No artifacts, no women, no vodka...
Can't argue with that... I had half a liter lying around somewhere...
Why were you keeping quiet then? Get over here, open your backpack. I've got a couple glasses here.
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Where did I put it? Ah, here it is - at the very bottom! Let's drink to women and artifacts!
Where is... where did I put it? Wait here a couple minutes, I'll run to one address, there'll be something to fix our health with.
Not bad arsenal you got there... Better than ours... Small glasses. Well, let's drink to the beautiful sex!
Let's drink!... Ooh, that went down well! What's the word?

Well, recently they sent a group, me included, to Dark Valley, to scout a passage there directly from the Warehouses, you understand, we're like in a cage here - Duty on one side, Brain Scorcher on the other. It was in the evening. So anyway, we observed this picture: faster than a bullet runs a bandit... well, we're confused. Apparently he spotted us and changed vector toward us, our jaws dropped, thinking, what kind of Rambo? Then our eagle-eyed Roman says: "He's not running alone there", well he had a thermal scope. We looked closer, and indeed... behind him the air seemed distorted. He ran another 20 meters closer, then we realized things were bad - 4 bloodsuckers behind him! Had to put down everyone, including the thug. Seems like some lackey. Found a spot on the map in the PDA, right here, no comments. The poor bandit's jeans were all brown - he shit himself. Anyone would've crapped themselves with fear in his place.
Constantly hearing screams somewhere nearby. Real creepy. But essentially, I'm not really up to speed on what's happening here.
Yeah, unlucky guy. Well then, let's have one for the road, and I'm off.
Well then, one for the road, and off to sleep, I'm tired today...
Hey there, guys!
Don't yell like that, this is a creepy place... doesn't like disrespect. Don't loom there, sit down. What did you want?
Was thinking of having a drink with the guys...
Well, that's just what we need, we're freezing here. Bring out the dear one.
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Here, take it.
Well, guys, I thought you'd treat me. Alright, I'll run to base, grab a bottle.

Respect, didn't let us die from cold... And we're sitting here waiting for the guys, waiting... they went to the village to clear out a bloodsucker den... seems we won't see them again. Shame about the boys... yeah.
Yeah, the hair on my ass is standing on end. Even vodka doesn't help. What else is happening here?

Ooh, you touched on a sacred topic. So many legends about this place. Before the 2006 emission this village was like the rookie village at Cordon, and my brother lived there. Everyone lived quietly, peacefully... Suddenly an emission hit with such force that far from everyone managed to survive... screams... waves of mutants poured from the Barrier side, one after another. The emission lasted about 10-15 minutes, but felt like 3 hours, many lost their friends then, next day they sent us to collect the corpses and bury them, but we would've done it without orders. I found my brother, you understand, my own brother, he was lying in the basement, painful to look at. I took his gun, see how it shines, and his PDA. In the PDA I found the only mark on the map, right here, and also a note addressed to me, but that's personal.
Lots happens here... Generally, come here less often - you got the whole Zone menagerie here. There's bloodsuckers, burers, controllers, dogs, even chimeras sometimes drop by...
Yeah, I sympathize, sorry. Well, let's have one for the road, I've got tons of things to do.
Thanks for the advice, but we'll see each other again somehow.
Hey there, guy. Got something to eat?
Got some, why?
Got something to drink?
What's not there, isn't there.
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
Well see? What would we do without each other? Already set up the spot... hold the glass! What shall we drink to?
Shame, I don't have any either.
Efficiently done. Let's drink to always having people like you, and that they always find people like me! Well, come on! Ooh, bitter, damn!
Don't say... It burns! Maybe you know something that I don't, eh?

Well, brother, you probably roamed the whole Zone yourself... No? Do you know anything about the Dead City? No? That's the main mercenary base. They captured me about half a year ago. Well, everything by the rules of the killer business - bag over the head, rifle butt to the skull and drove me in an unknown direction... They brought me, started squeezing out of me how to get to our base quietly... well I naturally didn't say a word to them. Left me for the night in a cage. Two more guys were across from me. One, by the way, looked a lot like you... we chatted about how to slip away from there. I noticed a Zone map there... some dots, could only remember one: seemed to be right here... then they dragged me out and hit me in the head with a rifle butt, came to already in the car, with a hood over my head. They dragged me out, put me on the edge of a cliff, said, like, last wish... and then, to my luck, an emission... Had to jump. Turned out to be some swamp, in the middle of the swamp - a trailer, waited out the emission in it. Turned out they brought me to Agroprom... barely made it home. Told everyone - they didn't believe me, because I was very drunk, you understand, surviving something like that...
Oh, where would I go? I've been here all day, they only put me here a week ago, so I haven't seen anything interesting. Come back later, maybe I'll find out something.
Interesting, it's a miracle you stayed alive. Well, bye.
Well alright, I'll drop by sometime. See you.
Why so pale?
It's so cold...
Why don't you warm up?
Would be nice to have something...
Not feeling it today...
Well, suit yourself.
I'll help you with that! Here! What are we drinking to?
And I'm freezing here... Thought someone would warm me up.
Let's drink so there's something to drink tomorrow! Ooh, strong. Here, chase it with sausage right away.
Yeah, thanks. Listen, where can you get rich with loot around here?

Well, everyone's got problems with that now. They say there's loot beyond the barrier, but going there is dangerous. Found out from my own experience - had no money, owed a lot to many people, so fate forced me to move beyond the Barrier. I'm walking... silence all around... I see something moving ahead, so I duck behind a rock. Stumbled, found myself face to face with an old acquaintance of mine, he'd been missing for a long time, but now he was half-decomposed, makes me want to puke when I remember. Well he was an authoritative stalker, managed to get rich with "Val". I took the backpack off him, why would he need it, I thought? Just lifted it up, I see monolith guys talking to moaning ones... Telling them like: "In the name of the Monolith...", ugh, so I quickly moved in the opposite direction... and literally half an hour later we were fighting off about fifty zombies. That's how it was. Found a couple stashes in the PDA, here and here. This one I cleaned out on the way, but too lazy to go to the other, plus I was loaded to the max, and I'd never been in those parts...
They say at Agroprom there used to be mountains of artifacts, now I don't know... Alright, Marked One, if anything, drop by.
You were lucky. I advise not doing that again. Alright, don't sleep - you'll freeze. See you.
Well alright, I'll drop by sometime.
